(Program
{+(If
  {+(Identifier)+}
  {+(Call
    {+(QualifiedIdentifier
      {+(Identifier)+})+}
    {+(Empty)+})+}
  {+(Identifier)+})+}
  (Assignment
  { (Identifier)
  ->(Identifier) }
    (If
    { (Identifier)
    ->(Identifier) }
    { (Identifier)
    ->(Identifier) }
    { (Identifier)
    ->(Identifier) }))
{-(If
  {-(Identifier)-}
  {-(Call
    {-(QualifiedIdentifier
      {-(Identifier)-})-}
    {-(Empty)-})-}
  {-(Call
    {-(QualifiedIdentifier
      {-(Identifier)-})-}
    {-(Empty)-})-})-})
